remarks: If ` ( aleph `` A ) ` is a GCH-set and its powerset is well-orderable, then the successor aleph ` ( aleph `` suc A ) ` is equinumerous to the powerset of ` ( aleph `` A ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
statement: gchaleph $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ ( aleph ` A ) e. GCH /\ ~P ( aleph ` A ) e. dom card ) -> ( aleph ` suc A ) ~~ ~P ( aleph ` A ) ) $.
